epfl.lia.logist.agent.entity
Class Agent

java.lang.Object
  epfl.lia.logist.messaging.MessageHandler
      epfl.lia.logist.agent.entity.Agent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CompanyAgent, VehicleAgent
public class Agent
extends MessageHandler
implements java.lang.Runnable

An agent represents a single moving entity in the simulation. An agent can either be a vehicle or a company in the context of logistics. It cannot exist alone and is controled by an agent state entity. For all behaviors, an agent state has an internal state machine specifying which moves the agent's behavior can operate. The agent state are drawable entitites.
